attributes.action: Petition to allow Donald Trump to visit the UK.
attributes.additional_details: President Trump has the right and it is his duty to protect the citizens of the United States of America, his immigration policy has been put in place to help the fight against terrorism.
attributes.background: Donald Trump should be allowed to enter the UK in his capacity as head of the US Government, he should also be allowed to accept an invitation to make an official State Visit to so the Queen.
